comment.author: 22056898@N07
comment._content: That is the small building which is currently mostly hidden by the Macy's Department Store sign on or about the day it was finally sold for a then record $1,000,000.00. See the Real Estate Field section of the 7 Dec 1911 New York Times at the link below: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9405E0DB1E31E233A... A May 2008 photo of this corner can be seen at the link below: cityroom.blogs.nytimes.com/2008/05/21/way-no-way-a-reques... A photo from another angle can be seen at this link: www.earthdocumentary.com/new-york-city/macys-01.jpg
